Shop & Product Elements

Easily build a modern fashion store that will captivate the shoppers! Makao comes with a comprehensive collection of beautifully designed shop elements.

Filters, Tags & More Feature top rated products, & let your customers easily look up desired products by filtering product categories or tags. Product Types Comes with a wide assortment of templates, including variable, external, downloadable product layouts, and the list goes on. Sliders & Carousels Makao provides you with tons of different ways to showcase products. Feature them in eye-catching sliders, metro lists & more. User Accounts Your customers can create their personalized profiles, as well as to save their product wishlists, track orders & save cart items.

Shop

Single Product Layouts

Shop

Shop List Layouts

For modern fashion stores, product presentation is the be-all and end-all. Makao comes with a huge selection of diverse and exciting shop list templates.

True Ecommerce Essentials

Not only does Makao make sure that your new online store captivates its visitors, it also comes with every element your fashion store can ever need.

Newsletter Pop-Up

Feature newsletter pop-ups on page load & prompt visitors to sign up for your newsletter.

Product Types

Layouts for presenting different individual product types; variable, downloadable, external…

Dropdown Cart

Users will have a handy overview of the contents of their shopping cart accessible at all times.

Wishlist

Let your customers add and save their favorite products to their personalized wishlist pages.

Order Tracking

A practical template which lets customers provide their order info so they can track its progress.

Quick View

You can enable amazing one-click quick view pop-ups for every individual product on your site.

Blog

blogging

Your Fashion Blog

Start your new fashion blog the easy way! Makao comes with a remarkable collection of blog list as well as single post templates which are sure to attract the attention of your audience.

View more

Portfolio

portfolio

Beautiful Portfolio Styles

Another great way to introduce your products and latest collections is to feature them in one of the many simply stunning portfolio list or single project layouts included with Makao.

View more

Inner Pages

Astounding Theme Features

WooCommerce

Compatible with the most popular free eCommerce plugin, the WooCommerce.

Fully Responsive

Made to look absolutely beautiful on all device types and screen sizes out there.

Customer Support

Our friendly team of support pros will help you with anything Makao-related.

Customization

Makao lets you easily adapt any section or element of your new site to your liking.

Multilingual Site

Full WPML plugin compatibility lets you create a multilingual website with ease.

Elementor

Create your pages the easy way using the powerful front-end page builder, Elementor.

Well Documented

Comes with a comprehensive, carefully compiled & easy to follow user manual.

One-click Import

Get the entire demo content with 1 mouse click thanks to the amazing import module.

Fashion & Beauty Go Hand in Hand With Makao!
